head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'NEILL, JAMES K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'NEILL, JAMES K.

block.p: O'NEILL-James K. On July 30, 2000. Beloved husband of Kathleen (nee Puccala). Loving son of Margaret & Thomas. Dear brother & best friend Patrick. Loving uncle of Megan Rose. Reposing at O'Shea-Hoey Funeral Home, Inc. 29-13 Ditmars Boulevard, Astoria, N.Y. Wednesday & Thursday 2-5 & 79:30 P.M. Funeral Mass Immaculate Conception Church Friday 9:45 A.M. Interment St. John's Cemetery. In lieu of flowers donations to Manhattan College/James K. O'Neill Scholarship fund, Att/Joe Valenti Manhattan College, Riverdale, New York 10471.
